Model

Class CellStone

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.Cell
      • Model.CellStone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Questionable

    public class CellStone
extends Cell
    Treasure chase

    A Model.CellStone has eight possible For each one, the best direction is always the same, so they are computed at the initialisation and stored in the map bestDirections

    Author:

      • process

        public void process(Hunter h)
        When a hunter aims to this cell, - he is not moved - he is redirected to the best direction to the treasure

        The best direction of the treasure depends on where he is, in relation with the current cell This best direction is computed at the initialisation of the board and found in the map this.bestDirections

        Parameters:
        h - the Model.Hunter to process

      • computeBestDirectionsToTheTreasure

        private void computeBestDirectionsToTheTreasure()
        TODO : compute the best direction to the treasure for each position. For the moment, the best direction is always set to Model.Direction.NORTH
